Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Packet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoutingPacket

    public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
    The Packet class models a network packet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decrement_ttl()
      Reduces the ttl by 1, ttl is set as 255 when a packet is created.

      • Packet

        public Packet(int s,
              int d)
        Packet construtor for the super class. This defaults to setting the packet type to be the UNKNOWN type.
        Parameters:
        s - source address
        d - destination address
